subject: Therapy and Rehabilitation
Running
New York City Marathon
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The San Patrignano drug rehabilitation center in Italy is not a typical training ground for marathoners, but it will send a team of six former drug addicts to compete in Sunday’s New York City Marathon.
snippet: The San Patrignano drug rehabilitation center in Italy is not a typical training ground for marathoners, but it will send a team of six former drug addicts to compete in Sunday’s New York City Marathon.
